original: @483a 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rtog pa las smon lam 'byung ba /
analyzed: @483a 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rtog pa las smon lam 'byung ba /
translated: The Aspiration That Arises from the Wish-Fulfilling Jewel Tantra of Avalokiteśvara

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the thus-gone, worthy, perfect Buddha Amitābha.

original: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Three Jewels.

original: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the noble Avalokiteśvara.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa mthu chen thob la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa mthu chen thob la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the bodhisattva mahāsattva endowed with great compassion, Mahābala.

original: btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol /
analyzed: btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol /
translated: Venerable Avalokiteśvara, endowed with great compassion, please consider me.

original: 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang / mtshan nas brjod pas bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal mi bzad pa thams cad zhi zhing rgyun chad par gyur cig /
analyzed: 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang / mtshan nas brjod pas bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal mi bzad pa thams cad zhi zhing rgyun chad par gyur cig /
translated: Noble Lord of Compassion, may all the unbearable sufferings of myself and all sentient beings be pacified and brought to an end through my recollection of you and the recitation of your name.

original: btsun pa spyan @483b ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: btsun pa spyan @483b ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Venerable Lord Avalokiteśvara, endowed with great compassion.

original: 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas /
analyzed: 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas /
translated: By recollecting and reciting the name of the Noble Lord of Compassion,

original: bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa dang gnod pa dang / phyir rgol ba thams cad rgyun chad par gyur cig /
analyzed: bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa dang gnod pa dang / phyir rgol ba thams cad rgyun chad par gyur cig /
translated: may all the fears, harms, and adversaries of myself and all sentient beings be eliminated.

original: btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Venerable Lord Avalokiteśvara, endowed with great compassion.

original: 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas /
analyzed: 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas /
translated: By recollecting and reciting the name of the Noble Lord of Compassion,

original: bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / mi dge ba'i chos dang / bdud kyi las skyes pa thams cad byang zhing grol bar gyur cig /
analyzed: bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / mi dge ba'i chos dang / bdud kyi las skyes pa thams cad byang zhing grol bar gyur cig /
translated: may all the karma, afflictions, non-virtuous dharmas, and demonic activities that arise in myself and all sentient beings be purified and liberated.

original: btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Venerable Avalokiteśvara, who is endowed with great compassion.

original: 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas /
analyzed: 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas /
translated: By recollecting the noble Lord of Compassion and reciting his name,

original: bdag dang sems can thams cad kyis btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal rtag tu mthong zhing smon lam ji skad btab pa thams cad kyang myur du thob par gyur cig /
analyzed: bdag dang sems can thams cad kyis btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal rtag tu mthong zhing smon lam ji skad btab pa thams cad kyang myur du thob par gyur cig /
translated: may I and all sentient beings always behold the face of the Venerable Avalokiteśvara, and may all our aspirations be swiftly fulfilled.

original: btsun pa spyan ras dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: btsun pa spyan ras dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Venerable Avalokiteśvara, who is endowed with great compassion.

original: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas /
analyzed: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas /
translated: By recollecting the noble Avalokiteśvara, the Lord of Compassion, and reciting his name,

original: bdag dang sems can thams cad 'phags pa gang dag zhal mngon sum du lta zhing dam pa mchog gsol ba thams cad kyang de bzhin du grub par gyur cig /
analyzed: bdag dang sems can thams cad 'phags pa gang dag zhal mngon sum du lta zhing dam pa mchog gsol ba thams cad kyang de bzhin du grub par gyur cig /
translated: may I and all sentient beings behold the faces of the noble ones, and may all our requests for the supreme and holy be accomplished.

original: btsun pa @484a *//
analyzed: btsun pa @484a *//
translated: Homage to the Venerable

original: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to Avalokiteśvara, the lord of great compassion.

original: 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas; bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi 'jig rten dag na phongs shing nyam thag pa thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar bgyid pa la mthu chen po thob par gyur cig /
analyzed: 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas; bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi 'jig rten dag na phongs shing nyam thag pa thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar bgyid pa la mthu chen po thob par gyur cig /
translated: By recollecting and reciting the name of the noble lord of compassion, may I and all sentient beings attain great power to bring benefit and happiness to all who are in distress and despair in the world.

original: btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the noble Avalokiteśvara, the lord of great compassion.

original: 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas /
analyzed: 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas /
translated: By recollecting and reciting the name of the noble lord of compassion,

original: 'jig rten dag na mu ge'i dgon pa chen po dang / me dang / chu dang / rlung la sogs pa'i gnod pa gang dag byung bas skye bo mang po nyam thag pa de dag zhi ba dang / ma mchis par bgyid par gyur cig /
analyzed: 'jig rten dag na mu ge'i dgon pa chen po dang / me dang / chu dang / rlung la sogs pa'i gnod pa gang dag byung bas skye bo mang po nyam thag pa de dag zhi ba dang / ma mchis par bgyid par gyur cig /
translated: may all the calamities that afflict many people in the world, such as great famine, fire, water, wind, and so forth, be pacified and eliminated.

original: btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Venerable Avalokiteśvara, who is endowed with great compassion.

original: 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas /
analyzed: 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas /
translated: By recollecting the noble lord of compassion and reciting his name,

original: bdag dang sems can gang dag 'jig rten 'di nas pha rol tu 'chi 'pho ba'i 'jigs pa chen po nye bar gnas pa na yang /
analyzed: bdag dang sems can gang dag 'jig rten 'di nas pha rol tu 'chi 'pho ba'i 'jigs pa chen po nye bar gnas pa na yang /
translated: when I and other sentient beings are in the presence of the great fear of death and transmigration from this world to the next,

original: 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug khyod zhal mngon sum du mthong zhing dbugs 'byin pa chen po mdzad par gyur cig /
analyzed: 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug khyod zhal mngon sum du mthong zhing dbugs 'byin pa chen po mdzad par gyur cig /
translated: may we see the face of the noble lord of compassion and receive great comfort.

original: bdag dang sems can gzhan 'chi 'pho ba dag gis kyang nyon mongs pa dag gis ma spros pa chos bdag med pa dran pa dang ldan pa /
analyzed: bdag dang sems can gzhan 'chi 'pho ba dag gis kyang nyon mongs pa dag gis ma spros pa chos bdag med pa dran pa dang ldan pa /
translated: May I and other sentient beings who are dying remember the selflessness of phenomena without being disturbed by afflictions,

original: byang chub kyi sems tshad med @484b par brtan pa /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems tshad med @484b par brtan pa /
translated: and may we be steadfast in the immeasurable mind of awakening.

original: sems ma zhum pa /
analyzed: sems ma zhum pa /
translated: May our minds not be discouraged.

original: spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang ldan zhing /
analyzed: spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang ldan zhing /
translated: May we be endowed with unimpeded eloquence.

original: sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad nye bar zhi zhing /
analyzed: sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad nye bar zhi zhing /
translated: May all feelings of suffering be pacified.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag bzhin du 'chi 'pho bar gyur cig /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag bzhin du 'chi 'pho bar gyur cig /
translated: May I die and transmigrate while maintaining mindfulness.

original: tshe rabs thams cad du yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du skye zhing tshe rabs rjes su dran pa dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi phun sum tshogs pa dang / ldan pas /
analyzed: tshe rabs thams cad du yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du skye zhing tshe rabs rjes su dran pa dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi phun sum tshogs pa dang / ldan pas /
translated: In all my lives, may I be born in the presence of the noble Avalokiteśvara, and may I be endowed with the perfect thought of awakening and the ability to remember my past lives.

original: 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug la sogs pa mnyes par bgyid cing /
analyzed: 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug la sogs pa mnyes par bgyid cing /
translated: May I please the noble lord of compassion and the others.

original: ji skad bstan pa bzhin du grub pa'i mthu dang ldan par gyur cig /
analyzed: ji skad bstan pa bzhin du grub pa'i mthu dang ldan par gyur cig /
translated: May I be endowed with the power to accomplish things just as I have taught.

original: ji ltar thugs rje'i dbang phyug des thugs rje chen po'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo lhun gyis grub pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs rje dang ro gcig par gyur cig /
analyzed: ji ltar thugs rje'i dbang phyug des thugs rje chen po'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo lhun gyis grub pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs rje dang ro gcig par gyur cig /
translated: May I become one with the spontaneous gate of liberation of great compassion of that lord of compassion, and may I become one taste with the compassion of all the buddhas.

original: ji ltar thugs rje'i dbang phyug gis sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba de bzhin du bdag dang sems can thams cad kyis kyang sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang /
analyzed: ji ltar thugs rje'i dbang phyug gis sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba de bzhin du bdag dang sems can thams cad kyis kyang sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang /
translated: purified the buddha realms, and perfected all the qualities of buddhahood, may I and all sentient beings bring all sentient beings to full maturity,

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid par gyur cig /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid par gyur cig /
translated: purify all buddha realms, and perfect all the qualities of buddhahood.

original: ji ltar dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas /
analyzed: ji ltar dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas /
translated: Just as the noble Avalokiteśvara, the embodiment of the compassion of all the buddhas and bodhisattvas of the three times, is remembered and his name is uttered,

original: dus gsum gyi rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa thams cad kyi mtshan nas brjod cing bsnyen bkur bgyis par @485a *//
analyzed: dus gsum gyi rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa thams cad kyi mtshan nas brjod cing bsnyen bkur bgyis par @485a *//
translated: May I be able to recite the names of all the conquerors of the three times and their children and honor them.

original: gyur cig / ji ltar dus gsum gyi rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa thams cad kyi thugs rje'i rang bzhin 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod cing mchod pa bgyis pas /
analyzed: gyur cig / ji ltar dus gsum gyi rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa thams cad kyi thugs rje'i rang bzhin 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod cing mchod pa bgyis pas /
translated: Just as the nature of the compassion of all the conquerors and their children of the three times is the noble Avalokiteśvara, by recollecting him, reciting his name, and making offerings to him,

original: thugs rje chen po'i yul du gyur pa sems can thams cad la yang snying rje chen por thabs kyi sbyor ba rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung bar gyur cig /
analyzed: thugs rje chen po'i yul du gyur pa sems can thams cad la yang snying rje chen por thabs kyi sbyor ba rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung bar gyur cig /
translated: may the great compassion that is the object of the great compassion arise uninterruptedly as skillful means for all sentient beings.

original: ji srid bdag ni 'khor ba'i tshe //
analyzed: ji srid bdag ni 'khor ba'i tshe //
translated: For as long as I am in saṃsāra,

original: de snyed bdag ni lus skyes par //
analyzed: de snyed bdag ni lus skyes par //
translated: for that long may I be born in a body

original: de srid mgon po mchod bgyid cing //
analyzed: de srid mgon po mchod bgyid cing //
translated: and make offerings to the protector

original: de snyed lus sbyor tshogs bgyid shog /
analyzed: de snyed lus sbyor tshogs bgyid shog /
translated: and gather the accumulations of that many bodies.

original: ji srid bdag ni 'khor ba'i tshe //🔽ji skad bdag gis ngag skyes par //
analyzed: ji srid bdag ni 'khor ba'i tshe // ji skad bdag gis ngag skyes par //
translated: For as long as I am in saṃsāra,

original: de srid mgon po'i mtshan brjod cing //
analyzed: de srid mgon po'i mtshan brjod cing //
translated: for that long may I recite the name of the protector🔽and make offerings to the protector🔽and gather the accumulations of that many recitations.

original: dag gi sbyor ba tshogs bgyid shog /
analyzed: dag gi sbyor ba tshogs bgyid shog /
translated: May I gather the accumulations of the trainings.

original: ji srid bdag ni 'khor ba na //🔽de snyed bdag gi yid 'byung ba //
analyzed: ji srid bdag ni 'khor ba na // de snyed bdag gi yid 'byung ba //
translated: For as long as I am in saṃsāra,🔽may I have that much renunciation.

original: de snyed mgon po rjes dran zhing //
analyzed: de snyed mgon po rjes dran zhing //
translated: May I remember the protector that much,

original: yid sbyor tshogs par bgyid gyur cig /
analyzed: yid sbyor tshogs par bgyid gyur cig /
translated: and may I gather the accumulations with my mind.

original: de ltar lus dang ngag yid kyis //
analyzed: de ltar lus dang ngag yid kyis //
translated: In that way, through body, speech, and mind,

original: thugs rje'i dbang phyug rten bgyis bas //
analyzed: thugs rje'i dbang phyug rten bgyis bas //
translated: may I rely on the Lord of Compassion.

original: lus dang ngag yid skyon bral zhing //
analyzed: lus dang ngag yid skyon bral zhing //
translated: May I be free of faults of body, speech, and mind,

original: yon tan phun sum tshogs gyur cig /
analyzed: yon tan phun sum tshogs gyur cig /
translated: and may I be endowed with all good qualities.

original: de ltar lus ngag yid kyis su //🔽thugs rje'i dbang phyug sku gsung thugs //
analyzed: de ltar lus ngag yid kyis su // thugs rje'i dbang phyug sku gsung thugs //
translated: In that way, through body, speech, and mind,

original: rtag tu sbyor bar bgyis pas na //
analyzed: rtag tu sbyor bar bgyis pas na //
translated: may I always be joined with the body, speech, and mind🔽of the Lord of Compassion.

original: thugs rje'i dbang phyug spyan ras gzigs //
analyzed: thugs rje'i dbang phyug spyan ras gzigs //
translated: May I be Avalokiteśvara,

original: srid gsum re ba'i gnas gcig po //
analyzed: srid gsum re ba'i gnas gcig po //
translated: the sole hope of the three worlds,

original: yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa //
analyzed: yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa //
translated: with inconceivable good qualities.

original: de 'drar bdag kyang grub gyur te //
analyzed: de 'drar bdag kyang grub gyur te //
translated: May I be accomplished like that

original: srid gsum re rdzogs bgyid gyur cig /🔽na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
analyzed: srid gsum re rdzogs bgyid gyur cig / na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
translated: and fulfill the hopes of the three worlds.🔽Homage to the Three Jewels.

original: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
analyzed: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
translated: Homage to the noble Avalokiteśvara,

original: bo dhi satv'a ya /
analyzed: bo dhi satv'a ya /
translated: the bodhisattva.

original: mah'a satv'a ya /
analyzed: mah'a satv'a ya /
translated: To the great being,

original: mah'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
analyzed: mah'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
translated: to the great compassionate one,

original: @485b tadya th'a /
analyzed: @485b tadya th'a /
translated: the formula:

original: aom tsakra barti /
analyzed: aom tsakra barti /
translated: Om cakravarti,

original: tsint'a ma ni mah'a padme ru ru tishtha /
analyzed: tsint'a ma ni mah'a padme ru ru tishtha /
translated: cintamaṇi mahāpadme ru ru tiṣṭha,

original: dzva la a'a karsha ya h'um phata sv'ah'a /
analyzed: dzva la a'a karsha ya h'um phata sv'ah'a /
translated: jvalākarṣaya hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: rtsa ba'i sngags rdzogs so //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i sngags rdzogs so //
translated: The root mantra is complete.

original: aom padme tsint'a ma ni dzva la h'um/
analyzed: aom padme tsint'a ma ni dzva la h'um/
translated: Om padme cintamaṇi jvala hūṃ.🔽The essence mantra.

original: snying po'o // aom bha ra ta padme h'um/
analyzed: snying po'o // aom bha ra ta padme h'um/
translated: Om bharata padme hūṃ.

original: nye ba'i snying po'o //
analyzed: nye ba'i snying po'o //
translated: The near essence mantra.

original: aom na ni badzre ni h'um/
analyzed: aom na ni badzre ni h'um/
translated: Om nanivadye hūṃ.

original: gsang ba'i snying po'o //
analyzed: gsang ba'i snying po'o //
translated: The secret essence mantra.

original: sngags snying bzhi 'byung ba dang / smon lam dang tshigs su bcad pa dang sngags su bcas pa rdzogs so ////
analyzed: sngags snying bzhi 'byung ba dang / smon lam dang tshigs su bcad pa dang sngags su bcas pa rdzogs so ////
translated: The four heart mantras, the aspiration, the verses, and the mantra are complete.
